member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerChallengeContext.AuthenticateFailure
member.summary: Any failures encountered during the authentication process.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerChallengeContext.Error
member.summary: Gets or sets the "error" value returned to the caller as part of the WWW-Authenticate header. This property may be null when is set to false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerChallengeContext.ErrorDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets the "error_description" value returned to the caller as part of the WWW-Authenticate header. This property may be null when is set to false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerChallengeContext.ErrorUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the "error_uri" value returned to the caller as part of the WWW-Authenticate header. This property is always null unless explicitly set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerChallengeContext.Handled
member.summary: If true, will skip any default logic for this challenge.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerChallengeContext.HandleResponse
member.summary: Skips any default logic for this challenge.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerDefaults
member.summary: Default values used by bearer authentication.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerDefaults.AuthenticationScheme
member.summary: Default value for AuthenticationScheme property in the JwtBearerAuthenticationOptions

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerEvents
member.summary: Specifies events which the invokes to enable developer control over the authentication process.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerEvents.OnAuthenticationFailed
member.summary: Invoked if authentication fails during request processing. The exceptions will be re-thrown after this event unless suppressed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerEvents.OnForbidden
member.summary: Invoked if Authorization fails and results in a Forbidden response.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerEvents.OnMessageReceived
member.summary: Invoked when a protocol message is first received.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerEvents.OnTokenValidated
member.summary: Invoked after the security token has passed validation and a ClaimsIdentity has been generated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerEvents.OnChallenge
member.summary: Invoked before a challenge is sent back to the caller.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerEvents.AuthenticationFailed(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.AuthenticationFailedContext)
member.summary: Invoked if exceptions are thrown during request processing. The exceptions will be re-thrown after this event unless suppressed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerEvents.Forbidden(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.ForbiddenContext)
member.summary: Invoked if Authorization fails and results in a Forbidden response

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerEvents.MessageReceived(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.MessageReceivedContext)
member.summary: Invoked when a protocol message is first received.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerEvents.TokenValidated(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.TokenValidatedContext)
member.summary: Invoked after the security token has passed validation and a ClaimsIdentity has been generated.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerEvents.Challenge(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerChallengeContext)
member.summary: Invoked before a challenge is sent back to the caller.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerHandler
member.summary: An that can perform JWT-bearer based authentication.
Initializes a new instance of .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerHandler.Events
member.summary: The handler calls methods on the events which give the application control at certain points where processing is occurring. If it is not provided a default instance is supplied which does nothing when the methods are called.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerHandler.HandleAuthenticateAsync
member.summary: Searches the 'Authorization' header for a 'Bearer' token. If the 'Bearer' token is found, it is validated using set in the options.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions
member.summary: Options class provides information needed to control Bearer Authentication handler behavior

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.RequireHttpsMetadata
member.summary: Gets or sets if HTTPS is required for the metadata address or authority. The default is true. This should be disabled only in development environments.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.MetadataAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the discovery endpoint for obtaining metadata

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.Authority
member.summary: Gets or sets the Authority to use when making OpenIdConnect calls.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.Audience
member.summary: Gets or sets a single valid audience value for any received OpenIdConnect token. This value is passed into TokenValidationParameters.ValidAudience if that property is empty.
member.value: The expected audience for any received OpenIdConnect token.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.Challenge
member.summary: Gets or sets the challenge to put in the "WWW-Authenticate" header.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.Events
member.summary: The object provided by the application to process events raised by the bearer authentication handler. The application may implement the interface fully, or it may create an instance of JwtBearerEvents and assign delegates only to the events it wants to process.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.BackchannelHttpHandler
member.summary: The HttpMessageHandler used to retrieve metadata. This cannot be set at the same time as BackchannelCertificateValidator unless the value is a WebRequestHandler.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.Backchannel
member.summary: The Backchannel used to retrieve metadata.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.BackchannelTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout when using the backchannel to make an http call.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.Configuration
member.summary: Configuration provided directly by the developer. If provided, then MetadataAddress and the Backchannel properties will not be used. This information should not be updated during request processing.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.ConfigurationManager
member.summary: Responsible for retrieving, caching, and refreshing the configuration from metadata. If not provided, then one will be created using the MetadataAddress and Backchannel properties.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.RefreshOnIssuerKeyNotFound
member.summary: Gets or sets if a metadata refresh should be attempted after a SecurityTokenSignatureKeyNotFoundException. This allows for automatic recovery in the event of a signature key rollover. This is enabled by default.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.SecurityTokenValidators
member.summary: Gets the ordered list of used to validate access tokens.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameters used to validate identity tokens.
member.remarks: Contains the types and definitions required for validating a token.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.SaveToken
member.summary: Defines whether the bearer token should be stored in the after a successful authorization.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.IncludeErrorDetails
member.summary: Defines whether the token validation errors should be returned to the caller. Enabled by default, this option can be disabled to prevent the JWT handler from returning an error and an error_description in the WWW-Authenticate header.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.MapInboundClaims
member.summary:
Gets or sets the property on the default instance of in SecurityTokenValidators, which is used when determining whether or not to map claim types that are extracted when validating a .
If this is set to true, the Claim Type is set to the JSON claim 'name' after translating using this mapping. Otherwise, no mapping occurs.
The default value is true.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.AutomaticRefreshInterval
member.summary: 1 day is the default time interval that afterwards, will obtain new configuration.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions.RefreshInterval
member.summary: The minimum time between retrievals, in the event that a retrieval failed, or that a refresh was explicitly requested. 30 seconds is the default.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerPostConfigureOptions
member.summary: Used to setup defaults for all .

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerPostConfigureOptions.PostConfigure(System.String,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerOptions)
member.summary: Invoked to post configure a JwtBearerOptions instance.
member.param: The name of the options instance being configured.

member.summary: A context for .

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.MessageReceivedContext.Token
member.summary: Bearer Token. This will give the application an opportunity to retrieve a token from an alternative location.

member.summary: A context for .

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.TokenValidatedContext.SecurityToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the validated security token.

member.summary: The '{0}' option must be provided.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.JwtBearerExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to configure JWT bearer authentication.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.JwtBearerExtensions.AddJwtBearer(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder)
member.summary:
Enables JWT-bearer authentication using the default scheme .
JWT bearer authentication performs authentication by extracting and validating a JWT token from the Authorization request header.
member.returns: A reference to after the operation has completed.

member.summary:
Enables JWT-bearer authentication using the default scheme .
JWT bearer authentication performs authentication by extracting and validating a JWT token from the Authorization request header.
member.returns: A reference to after the operation has completed.

member.summary:
Enables JWT-bearer authentication using the specified scheme.
JWT bearer authentication performs authentication by extracting and validating a JWT token from the Authorization request header.
